tax_percentage_audit_findings.summary: Comprehensive audit of tax percentage calculations across all countries to identify and fix calculation bugs

issues_found.issue: iDeCo (deferred account) showed 121.95% tax rate due to incorrect calculation
issues_found.root_cause: computeSetupTax function always calculated taxPct as (tax / gain) * 100 regardless of account type
issues_found.fix_applied: Updated japan.ts to calculate taxPct based on account type: deferred accounts use (tax / withdrawn) * 100, taxable accounts use (tax / gain) * 100, tax-free accounts use 0%

expected_ranges.iDeCo: 15-55% (progressive tax on entire withdrawal, percentage against withdrawal)

issues_found.issue: Pension Fund (deferred account) calculated tax percentage incorrectly
issues_found.root_cause: computeSetupTax function always calculated taxPct as (tax / gain) * 100 regardless of account type
issues_found.fix_applied: Updated italy.ts to calculate taxPct based on account type with proper handling for PIR 5-year holding period requirement

expected_ranges.PIR: 0% if held 5+ years, 26% + penalties if withdrawn early
expected_ranges.Pension Fund: 23% (reduced tax rate on entire withdrawal, percentage against withdrawal)

issues_found.issue: NPS and ELSS (deferred accounts) calculated tax percentage incorrectly
issues_found.root_cause: computeSetupTax function always calculated taxPct as (tax / gain) * 100 regardless of account type
issues_found.fix_applied: Updated india.ts to calculate taxPct based on account type with proper handling for NPS 10-year rule and ELSS 3-year lock-in

expected_ranges.NPS: 40% if withdrawn before 10 years, progressive tax on 60% of corpus after 10 years
expected_ranges.ELSS: 100% penalty if withdrawn before 3 years, 12.5% LTCG after 3 years

issues_found.issue: Riester pension showed 142.74% tax rate due to unrealistic early withdrawal penalty
issues_found.root_cause: Early withdrawal penalty was set to 100% of withdrawal amount (penalty = withdrawn), making total tax burden exceed 100%
issues_found.fix_applied: Updated germany.ts to use realistic 25% early withdrawal penalty instead of 100%

countries_verified_correct.note: Already correctly calculates taxPct based on account type (PGBL vs VGBL)
Already correctly calculates taxPct based on account type (RRSP vs TFSA vs Taxable)
Already correctly calculates taxPct based on account type (Riester/Rürup vs Taxable)

countries_using_generic_calculation.note: Most countries use the generic calculation path which is correct
countries_using_generic_calculation.calculation_logic: Generic path correctly calculates: deferred accounts use (tax / withdrawn) * 100, taxable accounts use (tax / gain) * 100, tax-free accounts use 0%

tax_percentage_audit_findings.key_principle: Tax percentage calculation must be based on account type: deferred accounts (tax on entire withdrawal) should calculate percentage against withdrawal amount, while taxable accounts (tax on gains only) should calculate percentage against gain amount.

crypto_tax: Short-term capital gains (held less than 1 year, taxed as ordinary income for single filer): 10% ($0-$11,925), 12% ($11,926-$48,535), 22% ($48,536-$103,350), 24% ($103,351-$197,300), 32% ($197,301-$250,525), 35% ($250,526-$626,350), 37% (over $626,350). Long-term (held more than 1 year): 0% ($0-$48,350), 15% ($48,351-$533,400), 20% (over $533,400). Mining/staking taxed as ordinary income at the same short-term rates.

401(k).contribution_limits: $23,500 employee deferrals (2025), +$7,500 catch-up if 50+ ($31,000 total). Combined employee+employer $70,000.
401(k).tax_benefits: Pre-tax contributions deductible, tax-deferred growth, taxed on withdrawal (EET). No tranches, full deduction up to limits.
401(k).holding_periods: Withdrawals before 59.5: 10% penalty + ordinary income tax. Loans and hardship withdrawals possible; after 59.5, no penalty.
401(k).eligible_investments: Stocks, bonds, mutual funds, ETFs; plan-dependent, no real estate or alternatives typically.
401(k).other_details: Employer match not counted in employee limit.

Roth 401(k).tax_benefits: After-tax contributions, tax-free growth and qualified withdrawals (TEE).
Roth 401(k).holding_periods: 5-year rule for earnings, age 59.5 for tax-free; early withdrawals of contributions tax-free, earnings 10% penalty + tax.
Roth 401(k).other_details: Income limits for direct Roth IRA, but not for Roth 401(k).

IRA (Traditional).tax_benefits: Deductible contributions (income limits: $77,000-$87,000 single, $123,000-$143,000 married), tax-deferred growth, taxed withdrawals (EET).
IRA (Traditional).holding_periods: Penalty 10% before 59.5 + tax; required minimum distributions at 73.
IRA (Traditional).eligible_investments: Stocks, bonds, ETFs, mutual funds; no life insurance or collectibles.
IRA (Traditional).other_details: Phase-out for deduction based on income and workplace plan.

Roth IRA.tax_benefits: After-tax, tax-free qualified withdrawals (TEE). No RMDs.
Roth IRA.holding_periods: 5-year rule, age 59.5; early contributions tax-free, earnings penalty + tax.

HSA.tax_benefits: Deductible contributions, tax-free growth, tax-free medical withdrawals (triple tax-free). Non-medical before 65: 20% penalty + tax; after 65, taxed as income no penalty.
HSA.holding_periods: No limit for medical; non-medical after 65 taxed as income.

crypto_tax: Cryptocurrency is banned; no legal tax rate applies.

Voluntary personal pension system.tax_benefits: Tax deduction up to CNY 12,000, tax-exempt returns, benefits taxed at 3% (EET).
Voluntary personal pension system.holding_periods: Until retirement age; early withdrawal may incur full income tax (up to 45%) + penalties.
Voluntary personal pension system.other_details: No specific restrictions on foreign investments mentioned.

Enterprise annuities.holding_periods: Until retirement; early access taxed as income.
Enterprise annuities.other_details: Limited foreign investment due to regulations.

crypto_tax: Tax-free if held more than 1 year or gains under €600; otherwise up to 45% plus 5.5% solidarity surcharge if sold within 1 year (treated as income, brackets for single: 0% €0-€11,604, 14-45% €11,605-€62,810, 45% over €62,810). Mining/staking taxed as income up to 45% plus solidarity, with exemptions up to €256/year.

Riester pension.holding_periods: Until 62 or 60 if started before 2012; early withdrawal repays subsidies + tax.
Riester pension.eligible_investments: Certified products: insurance, funds, bank savings; EU-focused.

Rürup pension.holding_periods: Lifelong annuity from 62; early not allowed.

crypto_tax: Progressive capital gains tax from 5-45% plus local 10% (total 15-55%) depending on total income (brackets: 5% <1.95m yen, 10% 1.95-3.3m, 20% 3.3-6.95m, 23% 6.95-9m, 33% 9-18m, 40% 18-40m, 45% >40m); no distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed as miscellaneous income at the same rates.

iDeCo.tax_benefits: Deductible contributions, tax-free growth, taxed withdrawals (EET).
iDeCo.holding_periods: From 60, annuity or lump sum; early withdrawal not allowed.
iDeCo.eligible_investments: Mutual funds, insurance; no direct stocks.

NISA.contribution_limits: ¥1.8m growth, ¥1.2m tsumitate annually; lifetime no limit.
NISA.holding_periods: Indefinite for new NISA; early withdrawal tax-free but loses benefits.
NISA.eligible_investments: Stocks, ETFs, mutual funds; Japanese and foreign.

crypto_tax: Flat 30% on gains (plus 4% cess), no deductions allowed; 1% TDS on transactions over ₹50,000 (₹10,000 for some). No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as business income at slab rates (0% ₹0-3 lakh, 5% 3-6 lakh, 10% 6-9 lakh, 15% 9-12 lakh, 20% 12-15 lakh, 30% >15 lakh) plus cess.

NPS.contribution_limits: No upper limit, but deduction ₹1.5 lakh under 80C + ₹50,000 under 80CCD(1B).
NPS.tax_benefits: Deduction up to ₹2 lakh, tax-free growth, 60% tax-free withdrawal (EET partial).
NPS.holding_periods: Partial withdrawal after 3 years (taxed if not for specified purposes), full at 60; early full withdrawal <10 years taxed on 40%.
NPS.eligible_investments: Equity, debt, alternatives; up to 75% equity.

ELSS.tax_benefits: Deduction under 80C, long-term gains tax 12.5% over ₹1.25 lakh.
ELSS.holding_periods: 3 years lock-in; early redemption not allowed.

crypto_tax: Capital gains tax at 10% (basic rate taxpayers, income £12,571-£50,270) or 20% (higher/additional rate taxpayers, income £50,271-£125,140 at 40%, over £125,140 at 45%) if gains exceed £3,000 allowance; no distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed as income at 20% (£12,571-£50,270), 40% (£50,271-£125,140), 45% (over £125,140).

SIPP.tax_benefits: Tax relief 20-45% on contributions, tax-free growth, 25% tax-free withdrawal (EET partial).
SIPP.holding_periods: From 55 (rising to 57 in 2028); early withdrawal 55% unauthorized payment charge.
SIPP.eligible_investments: Stocks, ETFs, bonds, funds; wide range, some restrictions.

ISA.eligible_investments: Stocks, ETFs, cash, bonds; UK and foreign.

crypto_tax: Flat 30% (12.8% income tax + 17.2% social charges); tax-free if annual gains below €305. No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as income up to 45%.

PEA.holding_periods: 5 years for tax-free; early withdrawal before 5 years: flat 12.8% + 17.2% social + closure; 0-2 years higher penalties.
PEA.eligible_investments: EU stocks/ETFs; no US stocks directly.

PER.contribution_limits: No fixed, deduction limits based on income.
PER.tax_benefits: Deductible contributions, tax-free growth, taxed withdrawals (EET).
PER.holding_periods: Until retirement, annuity or lump sum; early for specific cases (e.g., house buy) tax-free, otherwise taxed + penalties.
PER.eligible_investments: Funds, stocks, insurance; wide, including foreign.

Assurance Vie.tax_benefits: Tax on gains: 12.8% + 17.2% social if withdrawn <8 years; after 8 years, 7.5% + 17.2% on gains over abatement (€4,600 single, €9,200 couple).
Assurance Vie.holding_periods: 8 years for optimal tax (reduced rate); 4-8 years 12.8% + social; <4 years 12.8% + social (no abatement).
Assurance Vie.eligible_investments: Euro funds, units; stocks, bonds, foreign OK.
Assurance Vie.other_details: Life insurance wrapper; tax-free inheritance up to €152,500.

crypto_tax: 26% on gains over €2,000; planned increase to 42% (subject to confirmation). No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as income at 23-43% (brackets: 23% €0-€28,000, 25% €28,001-€50,000, 35% €50,001-€75,000, 43% >€75,000).

PIR.holding_periods: 5 years; early withdrawal: standard capital gains tax 26-42% + repayment of benefits.

Pension funds.tax_benefits: Deductible, tax-free growth, reduced tax on benefits (EET).

crypto_tax: 50% of gains taxed at marginal income rate (federal brackets: 15% $0-$57,375, 20.5% $57,376-$114,750, 26% $114,751-$177,882, 29% $177,883-$253,414, 33% >$253,414), effective 7.5-16.5% federal + provincial (e.g., Ontario up to 13.16%, total up to 26.5%); full amount if business income. No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as business or employment income at full marginal rates.

RRSP.holding_periods: Until 71, then RRIF; early withdrawal taxed + withholding.
RRSP.eligible_investments: Stocks, ETFs, bonds; wide, some foreign content limits.

TFSA.holding_periods: No minimum; withdrawals tax-free, add to future room.
TFSA.eligible_investments: Stocks, ETFs, cash; similar to RRSP.

crypto_tax: Progressive capital gains 15-22.5% on monthly gains over R$35,000 (15% up to R$5m, 17.5% R$5-10m, 20% R$10-30m, 22.5% over R$30m); flat 17.5% on offshore platforms. No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as income at up to 27.5% (brackets: 0% <R$28,559.70, 7.5% R$28,559.71-R$39,168.43, 15% R$39,168.44-R$50,788.28, 22.5% R$50,788.29-R$55,373.55, 27.5% >R$55,373.55).

PGBL.tax_benefits: Deductible, taxed withdrawals (EET). Regression table: 35% <2 years, 30% 2-4 years, 25% 4-6 years, 20% 6-8 years, 15% 8-10 years, 10% >10 years.
PGBL.holding_periods: Until retirement; early withdrawal higher tax per regression.
PGBL.other_details: Regression tax table lower rates for longer holding.

VGBL.tax_benefits: After-tax, tax on gains only (TEE partial). Same regression table as PGBL.

crypto_tax: 13% on gains up to 2.4 million RUB; 15% above. No distinction for holding periods; mining taxed at 25% profit tax for businesses.

Individual Investment Accounts (IIA).tax_benefits: Type A: deduction up to RUB 52,000; Type B: tax-free gains if held 3 years.
Individual Investment Accounts (IIA).holding_periods: 3 years for Type B tax-free; early: standard 13-15% tax.

Voluntary long-term savings plan.tax_benefits: Deduction, government matching up to RUB 36,000/year.

crypto_tax: No capital gains tax until 2028 (postponed); gains taxed as other income at 6-45% if over KRW 2.5m threshold starting 2028 (brackets: 6% KRW 14m-50m, 15% 50m-88m, 24% 88m-150m, 35% 150m-300m, 38% 300m-500m, 40% 500m-1b, 45% >1b). Staking/mining taxed as income at progressive rates 6-45%.

IRP.contribution_limits: KRW 9 million/year (part of KRW 18 million total retirement).
IRP.tax_benefits: Tax credits on contributions, tax-free if annuity after 55.
IRP.holding_periods: 5 years min; early taxed at income rates.

ISA.tax_benefits: Tax-free gains up to KRW 200 million lifetime.
ISA.holding_periods: 3 years for full benefits; early taxed at 9.9%.

crypto_tax: Capital gains tax at marginal rates 0-45% (brackets: 0% $0-$18,200, 19% $18,201-$45,000, 30% $45,001-$135,000, 37% $135,001-$190,000, 45% >$190,000), with 50% discount if held over 12 months (effective 0-22.5%). Mining/staking taxed as income at 0-45% same brackets.

Superannuation.tax_benefits: Concessional taxed at 15%, tax-free after 60 (EET partial).
Superannuation.holding_periods: Preservation age 55-60; early access limited, taxed + penalty.
Superannuation.eligible_investments: Stocks, ETFs, property; self-managed super funds allow more.
Superannuation.other_details: Bring-forward rule for non-concessional up to AUD 360,000.

Pension plans.holding_periods: Until retirement; early for illness/unemployment tax-free, otherwise taxed + penalties.

Afores.tax_benefits: Deductible voluntary, tax-free growth, taxed withdrawals (EET).
Afores.eligible_investments: Funds managed by Afores; stocks, bonds.

crypto_tax: Capital gains taxed as income at progressive rates 5-35% (brackets: 5% IDR 0-60m, 15% 60m-250m, 25% 250m-500m, 30% 500m-5b, 35% >5b); 0.21% final income tax on transaction value; 0.11% VAT on mining and exchange services (VAT exempt on asset sales).

Voluntary pension funds.tax_benefits: Contributions and income tax-exempt, withdrawals taxed (EET).
Voluntary pension funds.holding_periods: Until retirement; early taxed at income rates.

crypto_tax: No capital gains tax for individuals on non-securities assets like crypto; taxed as income at 15-40% if considered business/trading activity (brackets: 15% TRY 0-158,000, 20% 158,001-330,000, 27% 330,001-800,000, 35% 800,001-1,900,000, 40% >1,900,000). No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as income.

BES.contribution_limits: No upper limit, state match on contributions.
BES.tax_benefits: State matching 30%, deduction on contributions, reduced tax on benefits if held 10 years (EET partial).
BES.holding_periods: 10 years for full benefits, from 56; early <3 years: no state match, 3-6 years: 15% tax, 6-10 years: 10% tax, >10 years: 5% tax.

crypto_tax: Wealth tax under Box 3 at up to 36% on deemed yield (assumed return on asset value, not actual gains). No capital gains tax; mining/staking included in wealth calculation.
Exempt from taxation; no income or capital gains tax on crypto.

Exempt from capital gains tax for private investors; wealth tax 0.3-1% annually on holdings depending on canton. Mining/staking taxed as income at 0-40% (federal + cantonal brackets vary, e.g., federal 0% <CHF 18,300, progressive to 11.5% >CHF 895,800; cantons add 0-30%); professional traders pay business income tax up to 40%.

Pillar 3a.holding_periods: Until retirement age; early for house buy/disability tax-free, otherwise taxed + penalties.

crypto_tax: Flat 19% on gains and income; no exemptions or distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed at 19%.

IKZE.tax_benefits: Deductible, tax-free growth, 10% tax on withdrawal.
IKZE.holding_periods: 5 years or age 65; early clawback deduction + tax.

crypto_tax: Treated as property; gains taxed as income at progressive rates 5-40% (brackets: 5% NTD 0-560,000, 12% 560,001-1,260,000, 20% 1,260,001-2,800,000, 30% 2,800,001-5,600,000, 40% >5,600,000). No specific capital gains tax; 0.1% securities transaction tax may apply if classified as securities. Mining/staking taxed as income.

0% for normal private investment ('good family man' profile); 33% for speculative activity; up to 50% for professional traders (income tax rates, brackets: 25% €0-€15,820, 40% €15,821-€27,920, 45% €27,921-€50,000, 50% >€50,000). No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed based on profile. New 10% capital gains tax on financial assets including crypto starts January 2026.

Pension savings plans.holding_periods: Until 60; early withdrawal taxed 33% + local surtax.

crypto_tax: Flat 30% on capital gains; no distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed as income at 32-52% (municipal + national; national 0% <SEK 625,800, 20% >SEK 625,800; municipal avg 32%).

ISK.contribution_limits: No limit, but deemed yield tax.
ISK.tax_benefits: Deemed yield tax ~1.06% (2025), no tax on actual gains.
ISK.holding_periods: No minimum; annual tax on value.

crypto_tax: Flat 33% on capital gains; no exemptions or distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed as income at up to 52% (standard 20% €0-€42,000, higher 40% >€42,000 + USC/PRSI up to 12%).

Pension plans.contribution_limits: % of earnings by age, up to €115,000.
Pension plans.tax_benefits: Relief at marginal rate, tax-free growth, 25% tax-free lump sum (EET partial).

crypto_tax: Capital gains taxed at 15%; assets declared before March 31, 2025, taxed only on gains (exempt on holdings). No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as income at up to 35% (brackets: 25% ARS 0-101,679,575, 30% 101,679,576-1,016,795,752, 35% >1,016,795,752).
0%; no personal income or capital gains tax. 5% VAT may apply on goods/services purchased with crypto; corporate tax 9% on business profits over AED 375,000.

0% capital gains tax for individual investors; income tax up to 22% if frequent trading or business activity (brackets: 0% SGD 0-20,000, 2% 20,001-30,000, 3.5% 30,001-40,000, 7% 40,001-80,000, 12% 80,001-120,000, 16% 120,001-160,000, 19% 160,001-200,000, 20% 200,001-240,000, 21% 240,001-280,000, 22% >280,000). 8% GST on purchases; no distinction for holding periods.

SRS.holding_periods: 10 years staggered withdrawal for 50% exemption; early full tax + 5% penalty.

crypto_tax: Flat 27.5% on capital income from cryptocurrencies; no distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed at progressive rates up to 55% (brackets: 0% €0-€12,816, 20% €12,817-€20,818, 30% €20,819-€34,513, 40% €34,514-€66,612, 48% €66,613-€99,266, 50% €99,267-€1m, 55% >€1m).

Pension companies/occupational plans.tax_benefits: Deductible, exempt growth, taxed benefits at reduced rate (EET).

crypto_tax: Capital gains tax at 25%; no distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed as business income at up to 50% (brackets: 10% ILS 0-7,010, 14% 7,011-10,060, 20% 10,061-16,150, 31% 16,151-22,870, 47% 22,871-50,000, 50% >50,000).

Pension funds.tax_benefits: Tax credit, tax-free growth, annuity tax-free (EET partial).

crypto_tax: Capital gains exempt until December 31, 2029 (for trades on licensed platforms); income tax on mining/staking at progressive rates 0-35% (brackets: 0% THB 0-150,000, 5% 150,001-300,000, 10% 300,001-500,000, 15% 500,001-750,000, 20% 750,001-1m, 25% 1m-2m, 30% 2m-5m, 35% >5m).

RMF.holding_periods: 5 years, from 55; early clawback deduction + 3% penalty.

crypto_tax: Capital gains tax up to 15% on profits (progressive: 5% PHP 0-100,000, 10% 100,001-500,000, 15% >500,000); no distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed as income at 5-32% (brackets: 0% PHP 0-250,000, 15% 250,001-400,000, 20% 400,001-800,000, 25% 800,001-2m, 30% 2m-8m, 32% >8m); potential VAT on services.

PERA.tax_benefits: 5% tax credit on contributions, tax-free growth/withdrawals if qualified (TEE).
PERA.holding_periods: Until 55 or 5 years; early taxed + 20% penalty.

crypto_tax: Flat 22% on capital gains; no distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed as income at up to 52% (22% general + bracket tax: 1.7% NOK 217,401-306,050, 4.7% 306,051-774,800, 13.7% 774,801-1,065,550, 16.7% 1,065,551-2,225,000, 17.7% >2,225,000; plus municipal avg 22-25%).

ASK.holding_periods: No minimum; tax on withdrawal at 22%.

crypto_tax: Capital gains tax at 20%; 10% VAT on service fees. No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as income at 5-35% (brackets: 5% VND 0-60m, 10% 60m-120m, 15% 120m-216m, 20% 216m-384m, 25% 384m-624m, 30% 624m-960m, 35% >960m); proposed 0.1% transaction tax.

0% for occasional investors (no capital gains tax); income tax at 0-30% if regular trading or business (brackets: 0% MYR 0-5,000, 1% 5,001-20,000, 3% 20,001-35,000, 6% 35,001-50,000, 11% 50,001-70,000, 19% 70,001-100,000, 25% 100,001-400,000, 26% 400,001-600,000, 28% 600,001-1m, 30% >1m). No distinction for holding periods.

PRS.tax_benefits: Relief up to RM3,000, tax-free growth, taxed withdrawals at 8% (EET partial).

crypto_tax: Cryptocurrency is banned; no legal tax rate applies.

Investment tax rebate.contribution_limits: 15% on investments up to 25% income or BDT 1.5 crore.
Investment tax rebate.tax_benefits: Rebate on investments in approved instruments.

Universal Pension Scheme.tax_benefits: Contributions treated as investment for rebate, pension tax-free.

crypto_tax: No specific crypto tax framework; treated as asset or business income, taxed at progressive rates up to 35% (brackets: 10% up to 5 times annual exemption, 20% excess). Mining legal and taxed at 25% for businesses; trading regulated but no CGT specified.

Progressive 37-52% depending on income bracket (bottom 37% up to DKK 600,000, top 52% >DKK 600,000 incl. labor market tax; share income 27% <DKK 67,500, 42% >DKK 67,500); potential tax on unrealized gains under review. No distinction for holding periods.

Exempt from taxation for long-term investments; income tax up to 17% if professional trading or business (brackets: 2% HKD 0-50,000, 6% 50,001-100,000, 10% 100,001-150,000, 14% 150,001-200,000, 17% >200,000).

MPF.tax_benefits: Deductible up to HKD 18,000, tax-free growth/withdrawals (TEE).

crypto_tax: Treated as intangible asset; capital gains taxed at 10-15% for individuals depending on income (10% <COP 1,800 UVT, 15% >1,800 UVT); income tax up to 39% if business activity (brackets: 0% COP 0-1,090 UVT, 19% 1,091-1,700 UVT, 28% 1,701-4,100 UVT, 33% 4,101-8,670 UVT, 35% 8,671-18,970 UVT, 37% 18,971-31,000 UVT, 39% >31,000 UVT). No distinction for holding periods.

AFC.tax_benefits: Tax exemption on savings for housing.

crypto_tax: Treated as intangible assets; capital gains tax with 40% inclusion in income, effective rate 0-18% (marginal rates: 18% ZAR 0-237,100, 26% 237,101-370,500, 31% 370,501-512,800, 36% 512,801-673,000, 41% 673,001-857,900, 45% >857,900); annual exclusion R40,000. Income tax at 18-45% if trading/mining; no distinction for holding periods but losses carry forward.

Retirement Annuity.holding_periods: From 55; early taxed + penalties (two-pot system allows limited access).

crypto_tax: Flat 10% on gains (after 0% exemption ended July 31, 2025); no distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed as income at 10%.

Pillar 3 voluntary pensions.tax_benefits: Deductible, tax-free growth, 10% tax on benefits (EET partial).

VPS.tax_benefits: Tax credit up to 20%, tax-free growth, taxed withdrawals (EET).

crypto_tax: Profits taxed as income under Global Complementary Tax 0-40% progressive (brackets: 0% CLP 0-13.5 UTA, 4% 13.5-30 UTA, 8% 30-50 UTA, 13.5% 50-70 UTA, 23% 70-90 UTA, 32% 90-120 UTA, 35% 120-310 UTA, 40% >310 UTA) or Additional Tax for non-residents (35%). No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as business income.

APV.tax_benefits: Deduction or state subsidy, tax-free growth, taxed benefits (EET).

crypto_tax: Tax-free if held more than 3 years; otherwise progressive 15-23% (15% up to €80,000 equivalent, 23% above); exempt under CZK 30,800/year. Mining/staking taxed as income.

DIP.holding_periods: 10 years or to retirement; early taxed at income rates.

Pension insurance.holding_periods: After 60 and 10 years; early loses support.

crypto_tax: Cryptocurrency is banned; no legal tax rate applies.

Private pension funds.tax_benefits: Limited, no capital gains on funds.

crypto_tax: Progressive capital gains 30-34% (30% up to €30,000, 34% above); exempt under €1,000/year. No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as income at up to 44% (progressive state + municipal avg 20%, total 5.5-31.25% state + municipal).

Pension funds.tax_benefits: Deductible, reduced tax after 8 years (17.5% 0-5 years, 14% 5-8 years, 7% >8 years).

crypto_tax: Gains taxed as income at 10% for residents, 20% for non-residents; VAT on mining services. No distinction for holding periods.

Treated as intangible asset; capital gains taxed at 5% for non-domiciled individuals; income tax up to 30% for residents (brackets: 8% PEN 0-5 UIT, 14% 5-20 UIT, 17% 20-35 UIT, 20% 35-45 UIT, 30% >45 UIT). No distinction for holding periods; mining/staking taxed as income.
Cryptocurrency is banned; no legal tax rate applies.

Flat 15% on capital gains; no exemptions or distinction for holding periods. Mining/staking taxed as income at 9-44% (brackets: 9% €0-10,000, 22% 10,001-20,000, 28% 20,001-30,000, 36% 30,001-40,000, 44% >40,000).

Voluntary occupational funds.tax_benefits: Contributions excluded, reduced tax on benefits 5-20%.
Voluntary occupational funds.holding_periods: Duration-dependent tax: 20% <5 years, 15% 5-15 years, 10% 15-25 years, 5% >25 years.

crypto_tax: Cryptocurrency is banned; no legal tax rate applies.

Social security pensions.tax_benefits: No specific advantages; investments 10-35% income tax.
